article_title: Ask SAM: Can North Carolina make daylight saving time permanent?
article_text:
How do you think the charges will affect Cosby’s legacy?

Story: Bill Cosby is ordered to stand trial in sex case

links

Total Votes: 242

og.description: Q: Do you think that North Carolina will follow Tennessee on voting to remain on daylight saving time? I’ve never understood the benefits of switching back and forth.
